item.title: 杜邦将分拆为三家独立公司
item.description: 杜邦公司周三表示，它将分拆为三家上市公司，这使其股价在延时交易中上涨了 5%。【原文：DuPont said on Wednesday that it would separate into three publicly traded companies, sending its shares up 5% in extended trading.】

item.title: 由于需求下降，North Face 所有者 VF Corp 季度收入不及预期，并出现亏损
item.description: VF 公司周三公布第四季度业绩亏损，营收低于分析师预期，原因是旗下各品牌销售额下滑，反映出在消费者支出紧张的情况下，服装和鞋类需求不振。【原文：VF Corp posted a fourth-quarter loss and reported revenue below analysts' estimates on Wednesday as sales declined across its brands, reflecting choppy demand for its apparel and footwear amid strained consumer spending.】

item.title: 重量级人工智能公司英伟达（Nvidia）预计季度营收高于预期
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周三预测第二季度营收将超过预期，并押注于采用人工智能技术的企业对其行业领先芯片的巨大需求。【原文：Nvidia forecast second-quarter revenue above estimates on Wednesday, betting on insatiable demand for its industry-leading chips from businesses adopting artificial intelligence technology.】

item.title: 山姆-奥特曼的 OpenAI 公司与新闻集团签署内容协议
item.description: 山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）领导的 OpenAI 公司与媒体集团新闻集团（News Corp）周三表示，双方已签署协议，OpenAI 将可以访问新闻集团旗下一些最大的新闻出版物的内容。【原文：Sam Altman-led OpenAI has signed a deal that will give it access to content from some of the biggest news publications owned by media conglomerate News Corp , the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 尽管第四季度业绩向好，但 Elf Beauty 预计全年销售额和利润低于预期
item.description: 精灵美容公司（Elf Beauty）周三预计的年度销售额和利润低于华尔街的预期，这表明通胀严重已使美国人在化妆品和护肤品等平价奢侈品上的消费空间变得很小。【原文：Elf Beauty projected annual sales and profit below Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, in a sign that sticky inflation has left little room for Americans to spend on affordable luxuries such as cosmetic and skincare products.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，波音向中国的交付因国家监管机构的审查而推迟
item.description: 一位熟悉此事的消息人士告诉路透社，由于中国监管部门对驾驶舱语音记录器相关电池的审查，波音公司最近几周推迟了向中国交付飞机。【原文：Boeing's plane deliveries to China have been delayed in recent weeks due to a Chinese regulatory review of batteries related to the cockpit voice recorder, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 癌症受害者就 "欺诈性 "破产起诉强生公司
item.description: 一群癌症受害者周三起诉强生公司（Johnson & Johnson），指控这家医疗保健公司一再利用一家空壳公司的破产来解决数万起指控其滑石粉产品含有石棉并导致癌症的诉讼，从而实施欺诈。【原文：A group of cancer victims sued Johnson & Johnson on Wednesday, accusing the healthcare company of committing fraud through repeated and continued efforts to use a shell company's bankruptcy to resolve tens of thousands of lawsuits alleging its talc products contained asbestos and caused cancer.】

item.title: 消息人士称摩根大通准备就违反 CFTC 交易报告规定支付 1 亿美元
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的消息人士告诉路透社，预计美国商品期货交易委员会最快将于周三宣布与摩根大通公司就交易报告失误达成 1 亿美元的和解协议。【原文：The U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission is expected as soon as Wednesday to announce a $100 million settlement with JPMorgan Chase & Co over trade reporting lapses, a source with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 并非所有美联储官员都赞成缩减资产负债表进程
item.description: 美联储最近一次政策会议的会议纪要显示，当时关于放缓资产负债表缩减步伐的决定并不一致。【原文：Meeting minutes from the Federal Reserve's most recent policy gathering showed that the decision then to moderate the pace of the balance sheet drawdown was not unanimous.】

item.title: 高盛首席执行官称美联储今年不太可能降息
item.description: 高盛集团首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）周三表示，他预计美联储今年不会降息。【原文：Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon said on Wednesday he does not expect the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates this year.】

item.title: 普京批准关闭美国运通俄罗斯业务
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）在官方网站上公布了一项法令，授予美国运通公司 "自愿清算 "其俄罗斯业务的权利。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin has granted American Express Co the right to "voluntary liquidate" its Russian business, according to a decree published on the official website.】

item.title: 会议纪要显示，美联储官员在上次会议上尽管心存疑虑，但仍对消除通胀抱有信心
item.description: 根据美国中央银行 4 月 30 日至 5 月 1 日的会议记录，尽管美联储官员承认对最近的通胀读数感到失望，但他们在上一次政策会议上表示，他们仍然相信物价压力会缓解，即使只是缓慢缓解。【原文：Even as they acknowledged disappointment over recent inflation readings, Federal Reserve officials at their last policy meeting indicated they still had faith price pressures would ease, if only slowly, according to the minutes of the U.S. central bank's April 30-May 1 session.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会主席支持要求在竞选电视和广播广告中披露人工智能信息
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会主席杰西卡-罗森沃塞尔（Jessica Rosenworcel）周三提议，要求在广播和电视的政治广告中披露人工智能（AI）生成的内容。【原文：U.S. Federal Communications Commission Chairwoman Jessica Rosenworcel on Wednesday proposed requiring disclosure of content generated by artificial intelligence (AI) in political ads on radio and TV.】

item.title: 阿根廷黑市比索创新低，米莱反弹乏力
item.description: 阿根廷黑市比索兑美元汇率周三在非正式平行市场下跌3.91%，创下1美元兑1280比索的历史新低，今年早些时候的反弹因政治紧张局势加剧和谷物出口放缓而受挫。【原文：Argentina's black market peso weakened 3.91% against the dollar in the informal parallel market on Wednesday, hitting a record low of 1,280 per greenback as a rally earlier this year faltered on rising political tensions and slow grains exports.】

item.title: 美国立法者推进法案，更容易遏制人工智能模型出口
item.description: 众议院外交事务委员会周三投票通过了一项法案，该法案将使拜登政府更容易限制人工智能系统的出口，因为它担心中国会利用这些系统来增强其军事能力。【原文：The House Foreign Affairs Committee on Wednesday voted to advance a bill that would make it easier for the Biden administration to restrict the export of artificial intelligence systems, fearing China could exploit them to bolster its military capabilities.】

item.title: 辉瑞精简运营，目标到 2027 年节约 15 亿美元
item.description: 美国制药商辉瑞公司（Pfizer）周三表示，该公司已启动一项多年期削减开支计划，目标是在 2027 年底前节省约 15 亿美元的成本。【原文：U.S. drugmaker Pfizer said on Wednesday it had launched a multi-year program to reduce expenses and aims to save about $1.5 billion in costs by the end of 2027.】

item.title: 亚马逊投资者拒绝了所有 14 项外部提案
item.description: 亚马逊公司的投资者对所有 14 项决议都投了反对票，这些决议要求该零售商披露更多有关碳排放、董事捐款和成立委员会监督人工智能开发等问题的信息。【原文：Amazon.com investors voted against all 14 resolutions that would have requested the retailer disclose more about its carbon emissions, its directors' donations and form a committee to oversee artificial intelligence development, among other issues.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司称反垄断监督机构同意公司免于资产出售
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司（Petrobras）周三表示，该国反垄断监管机构 Cade 批准了一项协议的新条款，该条款将使该公司得以出售部分炼油和天然气资产。【原文：Brazilian state-run oil firm Petrobras said on Wednesday that the country's antitrust regulator Cade approved the new terms of an agreement that will free up the company from selling some of its oil refining and natural gas assets.】

item.title: 巴西哈达德称货币政策仍 "非常具有限制性
item.description: 巴西财政部长周三表示，尽管他认为消费者价格读数良好，总体通胀率在央行的目标范围内运行，但巴西的货币政策仍处于 "非常严格 "的水平。【原文：Brazil's finance minister said on Wednesday that the country's monetary policy is still at a "very restrictive" level despite what he considers good consumer price readings, with headline inflation running within the central bank's target range.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，FTX 的班克曼-弗里德被转移到新监狱
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引被监禁的 FTX 创始人发言人的话报道，联邦官员已开始将山姆-班克曼-弗里德转移到新的监狱，驳回了他留在纽约帮助准备上诉的愿望。【原文：Federal officials began the process to transfer Sam Bankman-Fried to a new prison, overriding his wish to stay in New York while helping to prepare his appeal, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing a spokesman for the jailed FTX founder.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，迪斯尼达成出售印度 Tata Play 股份的协议
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，华特迪士尼已就出售其在 Tata Play 的股份达成交易，对印度企业集团塔塔集团旗下卫星电视供应商的估值约为 10 亿美元。【原文：Walt Disney has struck a deal to sell its stake in Tata Play, valuing Indian conglomerate Tata Group's satellite TV provider at about $1 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 拉加代尔称已接近将《巴黎竞赛》杂志出售给 LVMH 集团
item.description: 法国媒体和商业集团拉加代尔公司（Lagardere）周三表示，该公司即将把旗下的《巴黎竞赛》杂志出售给奢侈品巨头路威酩轩集团（LVMH），企业价值标价为 1.2 亿欧元（1.3 亿美元）。【原文：French media and business conglomerate Lagardere said on Wednesday it is moving closer to a sale of its Paris Match magazine to luxury goods giant LVMH , on an enterprise value price tag of 120 million euros ($130 million).】

item.title: 百时美施贵宝和赛诺菲在夏威夷 Plavix 案中的责任增至 9.16 亿美元
item.description: 周二，夏威夷一名法官命令百时美施贵宝公司和赛诺菲公司向该州支付超过 9.16 亿美元的赔偿金，原因是它们未能警告非白人患者血液稀释剂 Plavix 可能带来的健康风险，而此前的判决金额为 8.34 亿美元。【原文：A judge in Hawaii on Tuesday ordered Bristol Myers Squibb and Sanofi to pay more than $916 million to the state for failing to warn non-white patients of health risks from its blood thinner Plavix, up from an earlier judgment of $834 million.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行首席执行官：欧洲银行间跨国合并在结构上不太可能
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale）首席执行官斯拉沃米尔-克鲁帕（Slawomir Krupa）周三表示，在法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）呼吁加强银行业整合一周后，欧洲银行之间的跨国合并在结构上不太可能。【原文：Cross-border mergers between European banks are structurally unlikely, Societe Generale CEO Slawomir Krupa said on Wednesday, a week after French President Emmanuel Macron called for greater consolidation in the sector.】

item.title: 路透社活动：首席执行官称 CSX 本周全面恢复巴尔的摩煤炭出口
item.description: 巴尔的摩港是美国第二繁忙的煤炭外运贸易枢纽港，CSX 首席执行官周三表示，在施工人员清理了部分深水航道后，CSX 本周将恢复巴尔的摩港的正常煤炭出口业务。【原文：CSX this week will return to normal coal export operations at the Port of Baltimore after work crews cleared part of the deep channel serving the second busiest U.S. trade hub for outgoing coal shipments, the railroad's CEO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: EEX 与纳斯达克的交易引发欧盟对捆绑产品和价格上涨的担忧
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的人士周三表示，欧盟反垄断监管机构正在就欧洲能源交易所（EEX）在收购纳斯达克欧洲电力交易和清算业务时是否可能通过捆绑产品扩大市场份额的问题征求反馈意见。【原文：EU antitrust regulators are seeking feedback on whether the European Energy Exchange (EEX) might expand its market power by bundling products when it buys Nasdaq's European power trading and clearing business, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 海湾竞争对手争当航空枢纽，沙特向电动飞行出租车公司 Archer 招手
item.description: 继电动空中出租车公司宣布与经济和地区竞争对手阿拉伯联合酋长国建立合作伙伴关系之后，沙特阿拉伯已开始向 Archer Aviation 公司示好。【原文：Saudi Arabia has begun courting Archer Aviation , following the electric air taxi company's announcement of a partnership with economic and regional rival, the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: 美国证券监管机构敦促不要通过加密货币法案
item.description: 美国证券监管机构周三敦促美国立法者不要通过一项旨在为数字货币建立新法律框架的法案，称这将破坏现有的法律先例，并使资本市场面临 "无法估量的风险"。【原文：The U.S. securities regulator on Wednesday urged U.S. lawmakers not to adopt a bill that aims to create a new legal framework for digital currencies, saying it would undermine existing legal precedent and put capital markets at "immeasurable risk."】

item.title: 凯雷出售 2.13 亿美元巴西 Rede D'Or 股份 - 报道
item.description: 据巴西当地媒体《巴西日报》和《Valor Economico》周三报道，私募股权公司凯雷将通过大宗交易出售巴西连锁医院 Rede D'Or 1.6% 的股份，价值约 11 亿雷亚尔（约合 2.1329 亿美元）。【原文：Private equity firm Carlyle is selling a 1.6% stake in Brazilian hospital chain Rede D'Or in a block trade worth about 1.1 billion reais ($213.29 million), local outlets Brazil Journal and Valor Economico reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 大众推迟在美国和加拿大推出 ID.7 电动汽车
item.description: 德国大众汽车公司周三表示，由于市场动态不断变化，该公司已推迟在美国和加拿大推出电动 ID.7 轿车。【原文：Volkswagen has delayed the launch of its electric ID.7 sedan in the U.S. and Canada, the German automaker said on Wednesday, citing changing market dynamics.】
